description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1000.
John may deviate from his default option 1 to exploit if he anticipates Kate's choice, leading to mutual defection penalties
Mutual selection of option 2 causes catastrophic losses (1000× round input), making coordination critical
Knowledge of defaults enables adversarial strategies but risks escalation
